greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Omit 5's from n.
comment: See A004724 for a variant where a(n) disappears when n has only digits 5. - _M. F. Hasler_, Jan 13 2020
program: (MATLAB) for u=0:74 ; v=dec2base(u, 10)-'0'; v = v(v~=5); if length(v)>0; sol(u+1)=(str2num(strrep(num2str(v), ' ', ''))); else; sol(u+1)=0; end; end; sol % _Marius A. Burtea_, Jan 13 2020
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
